posts.post_content:
I like the implications of this card.  
A removal enchantment that you don't really want to remove a creature with (but it can if you need it to).  
Seems decent in Limited.

posts.post_content: Great card for limited. Leads to some interesting decisions for both you and your opponent. In general I think the card's better when it doesn't kill the creature cause you can often get your opponent to kill it off for you, using their own removal on their guy. Put this on their unleashed [thrill-kill assassin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=thrill-kill assassin) and laugh (also, don't unleash thrill-kill assassin against black)
posts.html:
